s0041.literal: He was given the lands of Shanyang, and Ai resided there.
s0041.idiomatic: He was given the lands of Shanyang, and Ai resided there.

s0042.chinese: 宮室車馬衣服苑囿馳獵恣毐。
s0042.literal: Palaces, chariots, horses, clothing, parks, and hunting were all at Ai's disposal.
s0042.idiomatic: Palaces, chariots, horses, clothing, parks, and hunting were all at Ai's disposal.

s0043.literal: Matters great and small were all decided by Ai.
s0043.idiomatic: Matters great and small were all decided by Ai.

s0044.chinese: 又以河西太原郡更為毐國。
s0044.literal: Moreover, Hexi and Taiyuan commanderies were made into the State of Ai.
s0044.idiomatic: Moreover, Hexi and Taiyuan commanderies were made into the State of Ai.

s0045.literal: In the ninth year, a comet appeared, some say across the entire sky.
s0045.idiomatic: In the ninth year, a comet appeared, some say across the entire sky.

s0046.literal: They attacked Wei's Yuan and Puyang.
s0046.idiomatic: They attacked Wei's Yuan and Puyang.

s0047.literal: In the fourth month, the king stayed at Yong.
s0047.idiomatic: In the fourth month, the king stayed at Yong.

s0048.literal: On the jiyou day, the king was capped and wore his sword.
s0048.idiomatic: On the jiyou day, the king was capped and wore his sword.

s0049.chinese: 長信侯毐作亂而覺，矯王御璽及太后璽以發縣卒及衛卒、官騎、戎翟君公、舍人，將欲攻蘄年宮為亂。
s0049.literal: Marquis Changxin Ai created disorder and was discovered; he forged the king's seal and the Queen Mother's seal to mobilize county troops, palace guards, official cavalry, Rong and Di nobles, and retainers, intending to attack Qinian Palace and create chaos.
s0049.idiomatic: Marquis Changxin Ai created disorder and was discovered; he forged the king's seal and the Queen Mother's seal to mobilize county troops, palace guards, official cavalry, Rong and Di nobles, and retainers, intending to attack Qinian Palace and create chaos.

s0050.chinese: 王知之，令相國昌平君、昌文君發卒攻毐。
s0050.literal: The king learned of this and ordered Prime Minister Lord Changping and Lord Changwen to mobilize troops to attack Ai.
s0050.idiomatic: The king learned of this and ordered Prime Minister Lord Changping and Lord Changwen to mobilize troops to attack Ai.

s0051.chinese: 戰咸陽，斬首數百，皆拜爵，及宦者皆在戰中，亦拜爵一級。
s0051.literal: They fought at Xianyang, beheaded several hundred; all were granted ranks of nobility, and eunuchs who participated in the battle were also granted one rank of nobility.
s0051.idiomatic: They fought at Xianyang, beheaded several hundred; all were granted ranks of nobility, and eunuchs who participated in the battle were also granted one rank of nobility.

s0052.literal: Ai and his followers were defeated and fled.
s0052.idiomatic: Ai and his followers were defeated and fled.

s0053.chinese: 即令國中：有生得毐，賜錢百萬；
s0053.literal: An immediate decree was issued throughout the state: whoever captures Ai alive will receive a million cash;
s0053.idiomatic: An immediate decree was issued throughout the state: whoever captures Ai alive will receive a million cash;

s0054.literal: whoever kills him, five hundred thousand.
s0054.idiomatic: whoever kills him, five hundred thousand.

s0055.literal: They captured all of Ai's followers.
s0055.idiomatic: They captured all of Ai's followers.

s0056.chinese: 衛尉竭、內史肆、佐弋竭、中大夫令齊等二十人皆梟首。
s0056.literal: Guard Commander Jie, Palace Attendant Si, Assistant Yijie, Palace Gentleman Commander Qi, and twenty others all had their heads displayed.
s0056.idiomatic: Guard Commander Jie, Palace Attendant Si, Assistant Yijie, Palace Gentleman Commander Qi, and twenty others all had their heads displayed.

s0057.literal: They were torn apart by chariots as a warning, and their clans were exterminated.
s0057.idiomatic: They were torn apart by chariots as a warning, and their clans were exterminated.

s0058.literal: As for his retainers, the lesser offenders were made to gather firewood for sacrifices.
s0058.idiomatic: As for his retainers, the lesser offenders were made to gather firewood for sacrifices.

s0059.chinese: 及奪爵遷蜀四千餘家，家房陵。
s0059.literal: More than four thousand families who were stripped of rank and relocated to Shu were settled at Fangling.
s0059.idiomatic: More than four thousand families who were stripped of rank and relocated to Shu were settled at Fangling.

s0060.literal: In that month there was severe cold and freezing; some died.
s0060.idiomatic: In that month there was severe cold and freezing; some died.
